name: Ex-Girlfriend, Mami
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a climax, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. (Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Mami Nanami
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2)] At the end of this card's attack, if "Compared to When We Were Dating" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 3 cards from among them, put them on the top of their deck in any order, and put the rest into their waiting room.
flavor_text: My place is nearby, wanna come rest there?

name: Memories Between the Two, Mami
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Rent-A-GF》 characters among those cards ×1000.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Rent-A-GF》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Rent-A-GF》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Even though we only dated for a month, it sure left an impression!

name: Centimeter, Mami
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Rent-A-GF》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Equally Bad, Mami
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Let's Date" is placed on your climax area, if you have 2 or more other 《Rent-A-GF》 characters, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Rent-A-GF》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Let's walk down this path together!

name: Done With Love, Mami
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Rent-A-GF》 characters you have.
flavor_text: I already decided that I'm done with love!

name: Through a Viewfinder, Mami
ability: 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: "Annoying..." Mami

【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Rent-A-GF》 characters.
【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "As an Ex-Girlfriend, Mami" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: As an Ex-Girlfriend, Mami
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Annoying..." Mami" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Nerves of Steel, Chizuru" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Nerves of Steel, Chizuru
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Rent-A-GF》 character, this card gets +3000 power.

【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Sudden Visitor, Chizuru" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: There seems to be a slight misunderstanding, but Kazuya and I are really lovers, you know?

name: Step by Step, Sumi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Rent-A-GF》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 1 of your other 【STAND】 characters with "Sumi(墨)" in its card name] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Embarrassed Maiden" or character with "Sumi(墨)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Overly Shy Sumi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory on any position of their stage.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Rent-A-GF》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
